author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-763 - Add missing constraints to database tables

vcl.sql: removed constraint on userid field from continuations table. When a user is not logged in yet, there are a few times continuations are still used. In these cases, the userid field gets set to 0.

author: khmarbaise
msg: Removed executions block cause only the configuration for apache-rat-plugin is
important, cause execution is already defined in parent
